attributes.action: REDUCE THE BBC AND THE FEE!!
attributes.additional_details: I understand david camerons view that we need the bbc to be publicly funded incase of emergencys to get important information to public but I feel the bbc is bloated reduce the budget of bbc and reduce our fees by however much possible theres to many radio staions and  other media streams I believe a lot more savings could be made on this issue that affects a large amount of the population
